resources.string:
Battery optimization may silently shut down the app, block incoming calls and notifications, etc.

This permission will whitelist ANNAbel to prevent such issues. 

We are aware how important battery is and use it very conservatively.
This permission is required to use the ANNAbel during calls. Without this permission ANNAbel cannot make or receive calls.\n\nThe app will only access the microphone when you start a call.

This permission is required to allow ANNAbel to receive Voice over IP and cellular calls at the same time.\n\nWithout this permission, you might not be notified of incoming VoIP calls when a cellular one is ongoing.
This permission allows ANNAbel to display information (contacts book & call activity) and to search through your contacts.\n\nThe data will be solely used for display and search purposes.
